room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: Kidnapping is my second favorite room at Breakout. Did it with one other friend and we finished with 12 minutes left. So much fun and loved the environment for the room. The puzzles were a great difficulty for the 2 of us. Not too hard and not too easy. We had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: We did the kidnapping and it was awesome! It was just the two of us since no others had signed up for that time slot so that was nice. We ended up needing more than the allotted 60 minutes but since there was no one else signed up after us they let us finish! They only give hints when you ask which is also awesome. The only drawback we experienced is the safes in the room were malfunctioning and would lock us out after every wrong entry rather than after every third wrong entry like it's supposed to. I highly recommend and we will be returning!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: The Kidnapping room was so much fun. What's nice about this place is that if you get stuck and can't figure it out then they with give you hint to try to help you figure out your next step. Staff members were very nice and fun to be around. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: Great experience! Our team did the Kidnapping room. We will definitely return for another room in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: Did The Kidnapped room - it was totally worth the money. Had a great night and the Game Master was great. Glad we found this place and had a great family night out.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Des Moines in Des Moines
review: Staff was great and our game master was awesome. The rooms are amazing and challenging. Had a blast, will be back for sure!!!!
